root.description: System RequirementsMinimumOS: Windows Vista / Windows XPProcessor: Intel Pentium 4 processor or equivalent AMDMemory: 1 GB RAMGraphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6600 or equivalent ATIHard Drive: 2 GB HD spaceOther Requirements: Broadband Internet connectionRecommendedProcessor: Intel Core 2 Duo processor or equivalent AMDMemory: 2 GB RAMGraphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 or equivalent ATIHard Drive: 2 GB HD spaceOther Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
